Villager.name: Villager
Villager.description: Find the evils and vote them out during the day.
Villager.winCondition: Eliminate all Werewolves and Evil roles.

Werewolf.name: Werewolf
Werewolf.description: Wake up and choose a victim to devour.

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.description: Gaze into the crystal ball to reveal a player's team.
Seer.winCondition: Eliminate all Werewolves and Evil roles.

Doctor.name: Doctor
Doctor.description: Protect one player from attacks each night.
Doctor.winCondition: Eliminate all Werewolves and Evil roles.

Witch.name: Witch
Witch.description: See who died. Use a potion to Heal them or Kill someone else.
Witch.winCondition: Eliminate all Werewolves and Evil roles.

Cupid.name: Cupid
Cupid.description: Link two players as Lovers. If one dies, the other dies too.
Cupid.winCondition: Eliminate all Evils (or win as Lovers).

SerialKiller.name: Serial Killer
SerialKiller.description: Kill one player every night. Win alone.

Jester.name: Jester
Jester.description: Trick the village into voting you out to win.
Jester.winCondition: Get voted out by the Village during the day.
